* \[Suhani\]  PR Review   
  *     Issue: [\#598](https://github.com/meshery-extensions/meshery-linkerd/issues/598)   I have submitted PR [\#627](https://github.com/meshery-extensions/meshery-linkerd/pull/627) for the Auto-Labeler update, which now assigns labels automatically based on file changes. All requested changes have been completed. Kindly review it when you get a chance.  
* \[Suhani\]   Supply-Chain Attack Vulnerability  
  * Meshery-Linkerd currently uses version tags (e.g., @v3, @v4) in GitHub Actions. For security reasons, some projects prefer using commit SHAs instead of tags.  
  * [Example](https://github.com/jenkins-infra/plugin-modernizer-tool/blob/main/.github/workflows/update-metadata.yml#L14)   
  * [Slack discussion](https://mesheryio.slack.com/archives/C02F90W866T/p1764195712559859)
